document_data.name: Red Thunder Mercenary Corps
document_data.mainbody: The '''Red Thunder Mercenary Corps''' was a [[centaur]] mercenary company based in the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.History:
The Red Thunder Mercenary Corps was formed by the centaurs from the [[Chondalwood]] after they participated in the [[Battle of Five Crowns]] in the war against the [[arcanaloth]] [[Yrkhetep]].

Later they fought in the [[Shaar]], [[Vilhon Reach]] and [[Bloodstone Lands]], recruiting more members. After the [[Horde Wars]] they established themselves in the Hordelands, where they recruited a local centaur tribe.

Organization.Tactics: The Red Thunder were three units of 50 archers.
Organization.Contracts: The Red Thunder charged 150 [[gold piece]]s per week for their services. they worked primarily as caravan guards.
